title: Chinese Hackers Exploit Microsoft Flaws, US Nuclear Agency Hit
description: Microsoft Corp. warned that Chinese state-sponsored hackers are among those exploiting flaws in its SharePoint software to break into institutions globally, with the US agency responsible for designing nuclear weapons now among those breached.

title: Chinese Hackers Exploit Microsoft Flaws, US Nuclear Agency Hit

title: US nuclear security agency breached in Microsoft SharePoint hack
description: The US agency overseeing nuclear weapons breached in a China-linked hack of Microsoft SharePoint, according to Bloomberg. Officials say no classified data was exposed and the impact was limited.

title: This self-hosted tool pairs brilliantly with Nextcloud while solving its biggest problem
description: Like a Swiss Army knife for file transfers, this self-hosted tool helps manage what I put into my Nextcloud server and more

title: I replaced my Microsoft account password with a passkey - and you should, too
description: You can make your Microsoft account far more secure if you ditch your password. But if you plan to do so, there's a step you absolutely must not skip.
